(HES) on Weakness Following Analyst Downgrade Short Interest in Anheuser Busch Inbev NV (BUD) Increases By 54.8% Capstone Mining Corp (CS) Research Coverage Started at CSFB Pagegroup PLC’s (PAGE) “Buy” Rating Reaffirmed at Liberum Capital April 17th, 2017 - 0 comments - Filed Under - by Stacy Sanders Filed Under: Analyst Articles - UK - Finance Tweet Liberum Capital reiterated their buy rating on shares of Pagegroup PLC (LON:PAGE) in a research note issued to investors on Wednesday morning. Liberum Capital currently has a GBX 415 ($5.22) target price on the stock. PAGE has been the subject of several other reports. Barclays PLC reiterated an equal weight rating and issued a GBX 410 ($5.16) price target on shares of Pagegroup PLC in a research report on Monday, January 30th. JPMorgan Chase & Co. lifted their price target on Pagegroup PLC from GBX 320 ($4.03) to GBX 360 ($4.53) and gave the company an underweight rating in a research report on Thursday, January 12th. HSBC Holdings plc lifted their price target on Pagegroup PLC from GBX 440 ($5.54) to GBX 490 ($6.17) and gave the company a buy rating in a research report on Monday, January 30th. Numis Securities Ltd reiterated a hold rating and issued a GBX 400 ($5.03) price target (up from GBX 350 ($4.41)) on shares of Pagegroup PLC in a research report on Thursday, January 12th. Finally, Jefferies Group LLC lifted their price target on Pagegroup PLC from GBX 335 ($4.22) to GBX 395 ($4.97) and gave the company a hold rating in a research report on Thursday, January 12th. Three investment analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, six have given a hold rating and two have assigned a buy rating to the company’s stock. Pagegroup PLC currently has a consensus rating of Hold and an average price target of GBX 399.91 ($5.03). Pagegroup PLC (LON:PAGE) opened at 491.4962 on Wednesday. The company’s market capitalization is GBX 1.53 billion. Pagegroup PLC has a 52-week low of GBX 156.30 and a 52-week high of GBX 494.50. The firm has a 50-day moving average price of GBX 433.32 and a 200 day moving average price of GBX 400.93. COPYRIGHT VIOLATION WARNING: This report was first reported by Daily Political and is owned by of Daily Political. If you are viewing this report on another domain, it was copied illegally and reposted in violation of United States & international trademark and copyright laws. The legal version of this report can be accessed at http://www.dailypolitical.com/2017/04/17/pagegroup-plcs-page-buy-rating-reaffirmed-at-liberum-capital.html. The firm also recently announced a dividend, which will be paid on Monday, June 19th. Investors of record on Thursday, May 18th will be given a dividend of GBX 8.23 ($0.10) per share. This represents a yield of 1.92%. The ex-dividend date of this dividend is Thursday, May 18th. Pagegroup PLC Company Profile PageGroup plc, formerly Michael Page International plc, is engaged in the recruitment consultancy and other ancillary services. The Company’s segments include EMEA, United Kingdom, Asia Pacific and Americas. The Company is organized into approximately three brands operating at various levels of the market: Michael Page, Page Personnel and Page Executive. (HES) on Weakness Following Analyst Downgrade Short Interest in Anheuser Busch Inbev NV (BUD) Increases By 54.8% Capstone Mining Corp (CS) Research Coverage Started at CSFB Liberum Capital Reiterates Buy Rating for Pagegroup PLC (MPI) April 17th, 2017 - 0 comments - Filed Under - by Stacy Sanders Filed Under: Analyst Articles - UK - Finance Tweet Liberum Capital reiterated their buy rating on shares of Pagegroup PLC (LON:MPI) in a research note published on Wednesday morning, StockTargetPrices.com reports. Liberum Capital currently has a GBX 415 ($5.22) target price on the stock. A number of other analysts have also recently commented on the company. Jefferies Group LLC reaffirmed a hold rating and issued a GBX 410 ($5.16) price target on shares of Pagegroup PLC in a research note on Tuesday, April 11th. HSBC Holdings plc reaffirmed a buy rating and issued a GBX 490 ($6.17) price target on shares of Pagegroup PLC in a research note on Monday, April 10th. Royal Bank of Canada upped their price target on Pagegroup PLC from GBX 400 ($5.03) to GBX 430 ($5.41) and gave the company a sector performer rating in a research note on Wednesday, March 29th. Barclays PLC reaffirmed an equal weight rating and issued a GBX 440 ($5.54) price target on shares of Pagegroup PLC in a research note on Thursday, March 9th. Finally, JPMorgan Chase & Co. upped their price target on Pagegroup PLC from GBX 360 ($4.53) to GBX 390 ($4.91) and gave the company an underweight rating in a research note on Thursday, March 9th. Two research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, six have assigned a hold rating and four have issued a buy rating to the company. The company has an average rating of Hold and an average target price of GBX 422.27 ($5.31). About Pagegroup PLC PageGroup plc, formerly Michael Page International plc, is engaged in the recruitment consultancy and other ancillary services. The Company’s segments include EMEA, United Kingdom, Asia Pacific and Americas. The Company is organized into approximately three brands operating at various levels of the market: Michael Page, Page Personnel and Page Executive.
